GameObject.KindOf: STRUCTURE SELECTABLE IMMOBILE CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS FS_TECHNOLOGY POWERED FS_TECH_CENTER NOT_AUTOACQUIRABLE AUTO_ACQUIRABLE_BY_AI COVER

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubble") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged") end

GameObject.KindOf: STRUCTURE SELECTABLE IMMOBILE CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS FS_TECHNOLOGY POWERED NOT_AUTOACQUIRABLE AUTO_ACQUIRABLE_BY_AI COVER FS_RADAR

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubble") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_Ready" and Prev ~= "STATE_Idle" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_FIRING") end

CloneStoredObjectsSpecialPowerUpdate.DisabledTypesToProcess: USER_PARALYZED EMP HELD PARALYZED UNDERPOWERED TEMPORARILY_BUSY

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubble") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged") end
